QModManager

Thank you for installing QModManager.

Configure Steam

Set the Launch Options for Subnautica Below Zero to:

"/Users/{USERNAME}/Library/Application Support/Steam/steamapps/common/SubnauticaZero/QModManager.sh" %command%
